languages.text: "Нет сомнений, наш визит... взбудоражил обитателей этого места. Но вряд ли их преданность слуге Той, Что Жаждет превзойдет страх перед твоей властью — на чем бы она ни зиждилась в вашем обществе. Тебе нечего опасаться".

traits.locale_text: "Нет сомнений, наш визит... взбудоражит обитателей этого места. Но вряд ли их преданность слуге Той, Что Жаждет превзойдет страх перед твоей властью — на чем бы она не зиждилась в вашем обществе. Тебе нечего опасаться, а я уйду из этого места так же, как в тот день, когда впервые увидела тебя".

languages.text: "There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear."
languages.original_text: "Нет сомнений, наш визит... взбудоражил обитателей этого места. Но вряд ли их преданность слуге Той, Что Жаждет превзойдет страх перед твоей властью — на чем бы она ни зиждилась в вашем обществе. Тебе нечего опасаться".

traits.locale_text: "There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear, and I will leave this place just as I did on the day I first saw you."

"There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear, and I will leave this place just as I did on the day I first saw you."

"There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear, and I will leave this place just as I did on the day I first saw you."

"There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear."

languages.text: “毫无疑问，我们的造访已经……引起了这个地区居民的注意。虽然不知道你在社会中的权威基于何种力量，不过比起对饥渴女士虔诚，他们似乎更加惧怕你的权威。因此，你并没有什么好怕的。”
languages.original_text: "There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear."

traits.locale_text: “毫无疑问，我们的造访已经……引起了这个地区居民的注意。虽然不知道你在社会中的权威基于何种力量，不过比起对饥渴女士虔诚，他们似乎更加惧怕你的权威。因此，你并没有什么好怕的。”

languages.text: «No cabe duda de que nuestra visita ha... alterado la situación de los habitantes. Pero es improbable que su devoción por la Sedienta supere su miedo a tu autoridad, represente lo que represente para vuestra sociedad. No hay nada que temer».
languages.original_text: "There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear."

traits.locale_text: «No cabe duda de que nuestra visita ha... alterado la situación de los habitantes. Pero es improbable que su devoción por la Sedienta supere su miedo a tu autoridad, represente lo que represente para vuestra sociedad. No hay nada que temer».

languages.text: 「我らが来たことで…この屋敷の住民が不安になったのは間違いない。しかし、お前の権威を恐れずにかの渇きたる女への献身を続けるとは考えにくい。その社会基盤が何であるにせよ、だ。恐れるものなどない」
languages.original_text: "There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear."

traits.locale_text: 「我らが来たことで…この屋敷の住民が不安になったのは間違いない。しかし、お前の権威を恐れずにかの渇きたる女への献身を続けるとは考えにくい。その社会基盤が何であるにせよ、だ。恐れるものなどない」

languages.text: "Unser Besuch hat zweifellos ... die Bewohner dieses Orts beunruhigt. Aber es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass ihre Hingabe zu Ihr, die dürstet, ihre Angst vor Eurer Autorität überwiegt – worauf auch immer diese in Eurer Gesellschaft basiert. Ihr habt nichts zu befürchten."
languages.original_text: "There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear."

traits.locale_text: "Unser Besuch hat zweifellos ... die Bewohner dieses Orts beunruhigt. Aber es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass ihre Hingabe zu Ihr, die dürstet, ihre Angst vor Eurer Autorität überwiegt – worauf auch immer diese in Eurer Gesellschaft basiert. Ihr habt nichts zu befürchten."

languages.text: « Il est évident que notre visite a... fait du remue-ménage chez les habitants de ce domaine. Cependant, je doute que leur dévotion à l'Assoiffée prenne le pas sur la peur que leur inspire votre autorité, quels que soient ses fondements au sein de votre société. Vous n'avez rien à craindre. »
languages.original_text: "There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear."

traits.locale_text: « Il est évident que notre visite a... fait du remue-ménage chez les habitants de ce domaine. Cependant, je doute que leur dévotion à l'Assoiffée prenne le pas sur la peur que leur inspire votre autorité, quels que soient ses fondements au sein de votre société. Vous n'avez rien à craindre. »

languages.text: "Ziyaretimizin burada yaşayanları tahrik ettiğine şüphe yok. Gelgelelim Susayan'a olan adanmışlıklarının, senin otoritene dair korkularının önüne geçme ihtimali pek yok. Bu otorite senin toplumunda neyden kaynaklanıyorsa artık... Korkacak hiçbir şeyin yok."
languages.original_text: "There's no doubt that our visit has... stirred up the inhabitants of this place. But it is unlikely that their devotion to She Who Thirsts will outweigh their fear of your authority — whatever it is based on in your society. You have nothing to fear."

traits.locale_text: "Ziyaretimizin burada yaşayanları tahrik ettiğine şüphe yok. Gelgelelim Susayan'a olan adanmışlıklarının, senin otoritene dair korkularının önüne geçme ihtimali pek yok. Bu otorite senin toplumunda neyden kaynaklanıyorsa artık... Korkacak hiçbir şeyin yok."
